Class Ray

java.lang.Object
primitives.Ray
public class Ray extends Object
Ray class represents a ray in 3D space. It is defined by a starting point and a direction vector.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final Point
    point
    The ray is represented by a point and a vector.
    protected final Vector
    vector
    The direction vector of the ray.

  • Field Details

    • point

      protected final Point point
      The ray is represented by a point and a vector.

    • vector

      protected final Vector vector
      The direction vector of the ray. The vector is normalized to ensure it has a length of 1.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ray

      public Ray(Point p1, Vector v1)
      Constructs a ray with the given point and vector.
      Parameters:
      p1 - is the starting point of the ray
      v1 - is the direction vector of the ray

      Returns:
